data.title: Apple Infinite Loop campus
data.meta_description: The Apple Campus is the former corporate headquarters of Apple Inc. from 1993 until 2017. In April 2017, it was largely replaced by Apple Park, but is still an Apple office and lab space. The campus is located at 1 Infinite Loop in Cupertino, California, United States. Its design resembles that of a university, with the buildings arranged around green spaces.
data.text:
Former corporate headquarters of Apple Inc. in California, United States / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
